body_text:
We haven't used this notation elsewhere. IMO, I don't think we particularly need to denote if the class is private or not, since we have export/export default.
Reckon this is a good thing for @rehandalal and/or @mythmon to chime in on.
body:
We haven't used this notation elsewhere. IMO, I don't think we particularly need to denote if the class is private or not, since we have `export`/`export default`.

Reckon this is a good thing for @rehandalal and/or @mythmon to chime in on.
body_html:
We haven't used this notation elsewhere. IMO, I don't think we particularly need to denote if the class is private or not, since we have export/export default.

Reckon this is a good thing for @rehandalal and/or @mythmon to chime in on.
